meanings.definition: Small or insignificant in size or amount.
meanings.sent1: The ant carried an inconsiderable crumb back to its nest.
meanings.sent2: The inconsiderable pebble went unnoticed among the larger rocks.
meanings.sent3: The inconsiderable raindrop thought it could cause a flood.
meanings.sent4: Her inconsiderable voice was drowned out by the loud music.
meanings.sent5: The inconsiderable seed grew into a towering tree over time.

meanings.definition: Not worthy of consideration or attention.
meanings.sent1: The inconsiderable stain on the carpet was easily overlooked.
meanings.sent2: His inconsiderable excuse did not convince anyone.
meanings.sent3: The inconsiderable fly thought it was the star of the show.
meanings.sent4: The inconsiderable problem snowballed into a major issue.
meanings.sent5: Her inconsiderable presence went unnoticed in the crowded room.
